info.title: Climatiq
info.description: Climatiq helps you calculate the environmental footprint created by a broad range of emission-generating activities. We simplify the process of converting your operational activity data into CO2e (carbon dioxide equivalent) estimates, allowing you to understand your impact on the environment and identify actions to manage and reduce it.

post.description: Calculate total estimated emissions produced for a particular activity, in kgCO2e, using the available emission factors.

region_fallback.description: Whether to use the fallback region.
region_fallback.title: Region Fallback

post.description: Batch estimations can be used to calculate multiple emission estimations in a single request. Currently limited to maximum 100 operations per request.
Calculate total estimated emissions produced by passenger flights between the specified airports.
Calculate total estimated emissions produced by freight flights between the specified airports.

get.description: Returns metadata, such as what sort of providers and regions are available for the different computing endpoints.

post.description: Calculate total estimated emissions based on the usage for a set number of virtual CPU's (vCPUs).
Calculate total estimated emissions based on storing data for a set amount of time.
Calculate total estimated emissions based on having memory (RAM) available for a set amount of time.
Calculate total estimated emissions produced for a particular activity, as described by an industry classification scheme such as ISIC or NACE.

region_fallback.description: Whether to use the fallback region.
region_fallback.title: Region Fallback

post.description: Calculate total estimated emissions produced for a particular activity in kgCO2e using a custom activity that you have defined under the Activity Mapping tab inside your Climatiq Dashboard.

region_fallback.description: Whether to use the fallback region.
region_fallback.title: Region Fallback

post.description: Batch estimations for custom activities work like regular Batch Estimates, allowing you to calculate multiple emission estimations in a single request, all based on custom activities mapped in the Climatiq Dashboard. Currently limited to maximum 100 operations per request.

get.description: Allows you to determine what emission factors are available to be used in your estimates.

Climatiq aggregates several different sources for the same emission factors, as different organizations often come to different conclusions about how much an activity emits. This action returns a list of sources available for a given query.
Not all emission factors have data for all years. This action returns a list of years available for a given query.
Not all emission factors have data for all geographic regions. This action returns a list of regions available for a given query.
Returns a list of categories available for a given query.
Returns a list of sectors available for a given query.
Returns a list of life cycle assessment(LCA) activities available for a given query.
Returns a list of unit types available for a given query.
